The CAC can also help you improve your academic writing, deliver better presentations and learn how to retain information for your exams and assessments.

resources.name: Psychology

resources.description: SJS seeks to explore complex questions from an interdisciplinary angle, dissecting issues of social justice and inequalities from different academic and ideological approaches.

resources.description: SSD represents the interest of a wide range of students on the UVic campus who self-identify as having one or more disabilities.
